statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM environmental_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT location, COUNT(sensor_id) FROM environmental_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY location;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data JOIN sensor_metadata ON sensor_data.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE sensor_metadata.location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, recorded_at FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location_id, city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND temperature > 20 ORDER BY recorded_at ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_location, temperature, recorded_at FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 60 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC, recorded_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 27 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;

SELECT s.sensor_location, c.city, c.country, s.temperature FROM sensor_data s INNER JOIN location c ON s.sensor_location = c.city WHERE s.temperature < 20 ORDER BY c.country, c.city, s.temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, city, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM location GROUP BY location_id, city ORDER BY data_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, installation_date FROM sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading_value FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT manufacturer, model, calibration_date FROM sensor_metadata WHERE firmware_version = 'V1.0';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT s.sensor_name, sr.reading_value, sa.alert_message FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_readings sr ON s.sensor_id = sr.sensor_id JOIN sensor_alerts sa ON s.sensor_id = sa.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations
SELECT location, sensor_id FROM sensor_locations ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_locations WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_reading_value > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, sensor_id FROM sensor_locations WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature_value FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature_value > 25;
SELECT * FROM humidity_readings WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
